Generation III.Ruby: Slakoth lolls around for over twenty hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This Pok é mon 's sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
Generation III.Sapphire: Slakoth 's heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this Pok é mon in motion.
Generation III.Emerald: It sleeps virtually all day and night long. It doesn't change its nest its entire life, but it sometimes travels great distances by swimming in rivers.
Generation III.FireRed: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.
